form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Risch (for himself, Mr. Peters, Mr. Gardner, and Mrs. Shaheen) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To establish authorization levels for general business loans for fiscal years 2015 and 2016.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Lending Reauthorization Act of 2015.
Section 20 of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 631 note) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (j) as subsection (f); and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: For fiscal year 2015, the Administrator is authorized to make $20,500,000,000 in general business loans, as provided in section 7(a).
For fiscal year 2016, the Administrator is authorized to make $23,500,000,000 in general business loans, as provided in section 7(a).
